name: pal1bg.bmp
comment: 1 bit palette black and white,white is the first color in palette

name: pal1wb.bmp
comment: 1 bit pixel paletted images with colors other than black and white

name: pal2.bmp
comment: A paletted image with 2 bits/pixel. Usually only 1, 4, and 8 are allowed, but 2 is legal on Windows CE

name: pal2color.bmp
comment: Same as pal2.bmp, but with a color palette instead of grayscale palette.

name: pal4.bmp
comment: Paletted image with 12 palette colors, and 4 bits/pixel.

name: pal4gs.bmp
comment: Paletted image with 12 grayscale palette colors, and 4 bits/pixel.
